mapper.sql: ID,USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL_ID, USER_ACCOUNT_ID, BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_NO, DETAIL_TYPE, DETAIL_IO, FROM_ACCOUNT_NAME, FROM_ACCOUNT_NO, FROM_BANK_CODE, FROM_BANK_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NO, TO_BANK_CODE, TO_BANK_NAME, APPLY_TIME, END_TIME, APPLY_AMOUNT, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.update: update T_USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL SET ISVALID='0' where USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL_ID = #{userAccountDetailId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL (USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL_ID, USER_ACCOUNT_ID, BUSINESS_ID, BUSINESS_NO, DETAIL_TYPE, DETAIL_IO, FROM_ACCOUNT_NAME, FROM_ACCOUNT_NO, FROM_BANK_CODE, FROM_BANK_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NAME, TO_ACCOUNT_NO, TO_BANK_CODE, TO_BANK_NAME, APPLY_TIME, END_TIME, APPLY_AMOUNT, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{userAccountDetailId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailIo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select from T_USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL where USER_ACCOUNT_DETAIL_ID = #{userAccountDetailId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
